mapper.select: /* 단일 수리 종류 조회 쿼리 */ select r_type_no as repairTypeNo , r_type_order as repairTypeOrder , title as title , explanation as explanation , reg_dt as regDt , mod_dt as modDt from web_app_test.tb_repair_type where r_type_no = #{repairTypeNo}

/* 단일 수리 지역 조회 쿼리 */ select r_location_no as repairLocationNo , r_location_order as repairLocationOrder , name as name , reg_dt as regDt , mod_dt as modDt from web_app_test.tb_repair_location where r_location_no = #{repairLocationNo}

/* 단일 수리 상태 조회 쿼리 */ select r_state_no as repairStateNo , name as name , explanation as explanation , reg_dt as regDt , mod_dt as modDt from web_app_test.tb_repair_state where r_state_no = #{repairStateNo}

/* 단일 견적 문의 조회 쿼리 */ select tb_r_apply.r_apply_no as repairApplyNo , tb_r_apply.r_type_no as repairTypeNo , tb_r_location.r_location_no as repairLocationNo , tb_r_state.r_state_no as repairStateNo , tb_r_apply.user_type as userTypeEnum , tb_r_apply.phone_number as phoneNumber , tb_r_apply.agree_or_not as agreeOrNotEnum , tb_r_apply.explanation as explanation , tb_r_apply.reg_dt as regDt , tb_r_apply.mod_dt as modDt from web_app_test.tb_repair_apply as tb_r_apply inner join web_app_test.tb_repair_type as tb_r_type on tb_r_apply.r_type_no = tb_r_type.r_type_no inner join web_app_test.tb_repair_state as tb_r_state on tb_r_apply.r_state_no = tb_r_state.r_state_no inner join web_app_test.tb_repair_location as tb_r_location on tb_r_apply.r_location_no = tb_r_location.r_location_no where tb_r_apply.r_apply_no = #{repairApplyNo}

/* 견적 문의 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_r_apply.r_apply_no as repairApplyNo , tb_r_apply.r_type_no as repairTypeNo , tb_r_location.r_location_no as repairLocationNo , tb_r_state.r_state_no as repairStateNo , tb_r_apply.user_type as userTypeEnum , tb_r_apply.phone_number as phoneNumber , tb_r_apply.agree_or_not as agreeOrNotEnum , tb_r_apply.explanation as explanation , tb_r_apply.reg_dt as regDt , tb_r_apply.mod_dt as modDt from web_app_test.tb_repair_apply as tb_r_apply inner join web_app_test.tb_repair_type as tb_r_type on tb_r_apply.r_type_no = tb_r_type.r_type_no inner join web_app_test.tb_repair_state as tb_r_state on tb_r_apply.r_state_no = tb_r_state.r_state_no inner join web_app_test.tb_repair_location as tb_r_location on tb_r_apply.r_location_no = tb_r_location.r_location_no order by tb_r_apply.r_apply_no desc

/* 전체 견적문의의 개수를 조회하는 쿼리 */
select count(*) from web_app_test.tb_repair_apply where r_apply_no > 0
